item.title: Help me improving my track please!
item.dc:creator: Zoruwhite
item.description:
The bassline is sweet, and lead works really well together with drums, if I might add though, the second break could have a hat filler. Hope that helps!

item.title: Help me improving my track please!
item.dc:creator: PANDA
item.description:
First off, the drums and bass line are pretty damn good and the lead has a good vibe too. But I feel like it’s missing something.I did some stuff with it in the beginning and tried to keep the same vibe.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/UAIcADGU7vISI5yyeXU4EQ==

Honestly though, just add more instruments, layer similar sounds and add more layers of different drums together and I guarantee it will sound better.

Read full topic
